name: PublicMafia
short_description:
Did you love that original party game Mafia? Where all participants got random roles. Good versus Bad. Town versus Mafia. And the neutral who took either took sides with the superior, or just tried to obliterate all.

We're a good community working to make this game as fun as possible for everyone. Have some programming knowledge that you want to share? Come join us in the forums.

We're trying to make as much roles as possible, which creates variety in games. If you have any ideas, will be sure to listen. Post your thoughts on the forums.

~DavudPro
summary: We are a committed group to remake the original party game Mafia.
